message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This is my final offer.

I'm getting closer to my budget, but I still think $17,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll propose $14,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
